page.title: 10Annual Events, Craignish.
page.content: HOGMANAY (Dec 31>Jan I) Traditionally the night to visit friends, going from house to house around the village. (Valentine's Day(Feb 14)& April Fool's Day (April I)interest mainly children. ARDFERN DAY(Mid July)Sideshows,sports, competitions, pony rides, tug-o-war, pipe bands,flower show,diving/sailing/ athletic demonstations, dancing, etc., held in (& in grounds of) hotel. HALLOWEEN (Oct 31) On this evening the local children 'disguise' themselves (often as witches) & visit neighbours who have to guess their identity or (& they usually do anyway)'pay' with nuts or sweets.The 'guisers'sing or recite. BONFIRE NIGHT(Nov 5)is more recognised than it was(mainly'communal'displays). AGRICULTURAL SHOW(Nov)blackface sheep judging(& for other events see page 9) CHRISTMAS(Dec 25)A family celebration. (pre-Xmas children's party at hotel).
